text:
good veggie sandwich but they got rid of bone in wings.

Edit: back to 5 stars, the bone in were not available list time I tried to order but they were back yesterday. Great flavor.

name: Ruben Moncayo
text: Great flavors, I did not expect how good it was.

name: LiaDenise H-family
text: Pizza itself is similar to littleCesar's, lots of sauce. Crust is so good tho!

name: Aynz H
text: When my daughter and I found out about Hungry Howies last year,, we fell in pizza love and never went back to the Hut and Domins. The extra butter crust sold us and great vipe with staff. Highly recommend to the Edgemere families to try it out.

name: Raul Escajeda
text: The pizza was great. The were short staffed still they gave a great service.

name: Stevocan2 _
text:
Great prices.
Great pizza.
I‚Äôve never met a staff so friendly. My favorite are the cookies! Greatly recommended!!

name: Mando Hondo
text: My god, just ordered a large pepperoni and bacon with stuff crust and wow so much better than little Cesars and Speedys üëå now my go-to please don‚Äôt let me down like the rest of them üòÇ

name: Mikey Claggett
text: Great pizza. Unique crust choices. Polite staff!

name: Siete 77
text: They sometimes don‚Äôt even answer to you after 8PM, ON WEEKEND!!!

name: Jacob Trujillo
text: I had no idea there was an El Paso location. I loved Hungry Howies when I was stationed in Florida, never thought I would have it again. The pizza is amazing, and their baked bread is just as great. I recommend their cajun bread with garlic sauce.

name: Dwayne McCullough
text: Love Hungry Howie's! Grew up with them in Florida so was really happy to find them here in El Paso. This franchise location is making it fresh. Haven't had a bad pizza yet here and the staff is very friendly.  Place is always clean and presentable too. üëçüëç

name: Aaron Callejas
text: Hope they never go out of business

name: pguin
text: First time trying this pizza and it was so good! I got pepperoni bacon with asiago cheese crust

name: Rocio Arteaga
text: Great customer service and the pizza is delicious! I like the fact that you can select the crust flavor. Also their rewards app is very good!

name: alejandrina chavarria
text: It was delicious and service great but a bit pricey. The first time the family trying it and they approved. Also staff needs to explain a bit more when its the first time for a client ordering cause I did feel a bit rushed

name: Nancy Chavez
text: I love the pizza here. It is so delicious. The staff is so friendly when I go and pick it up and provide great customer service!! This place continues to amaze me!!! Great management thanks for all of your hard work!

name: Kelli Rust
text: It pains me to have to only rate 3 stars and I truly hope to alter this review in the future.  I have been a Hungry Howie's fan since I was 9 years old.  When this one opened less than 5 miles from my house I was ecstatic.  Since their ‚Ä¶More

name: Curtis Garner
text: Received pizza that looks like someone was throwing it around with all toppings falling off. I wish it would allow me to send a picture.  Then they gave me hassle about getting a new pie.

name: Christopher Irizarry
text: Your employees keep hanging up the phone instead of answering. Called 3 times same outcome. 22 Aug 2020 6:30pm

name: Stephen Obrien
text: I live 2 miles away. There website says I'm to far away to deliver. I put in a complaint with them. It's been a week. They never got back to me

name: Jazmin Zuniga
text: Great Pizza! We loved it.

name: JCR Lemon
text: Good food. Decent pricing.

name: Gilbert Moncada
text: Excellent pizza, compares to Pizza Hut but way better. Tried the rolls, deep dish, and stuffed crust, haven't been disappointed yet. Great deals on the app too, do yourself a favor and get the half off pizzas they have on the website while they still offer them.

name: Charles Kincaid
text: Used to go to HH almost everyday growing up in Ypsi, MI. Been 20 plus years since i had Howie Bread. Tastes better than I remember! The only bad thing about this location: no tables for dine in option

name: Dwayne McCullough
text: Great üçï pizza! Order is always right and ready for pickup on time.

name: victor serratos
text: Amazing pizza would really recommend it. Staff has really good customer service and the prices are good. I went in there and they have lots of deals and coupons and since I‚Äôm military they gave me 30% off

name: Elizabeth Willison
text: We prefer this over speedys and little Caesars. It's fun to pick a different crust flavor (or 2 if your family cannot decide). They always have great deals too.

name: r l
text: Had a BAD EXPERIENCE TODAY AT THIS LOCATION,  IVE ALWAYS HAD GOOD EXPERIENCES UNTIL TODA . I GET HOME AND MY DEEP DISH PIZZA WAS BURNT.

name: David Fernandez
text: My family and I really love the variety of  flavored crusts. Usually the crusts end up in the garbage with other pizza places but not with Hungry Howie's. Their subs are pretty good too.

name: Katia Hernandez
text: I love this place! Pizzas are very good and they have a lot of deals. The customer service is always nice and the flavored crust is the best thing here. :)

name: Panda Man
text: I worked in the pizza business for about 10 years so I know pizza.  The crust was delicious, and the pizza wasn't too oily.  The amount of toppings were a little light, but that is normal in most pizza places in El Paso, unfortunately.  I ‚Ä¶More

name: Josef Ozer
text: Great Pizza.  I am a personal fan of the Hawaiian Pizza. My family loves the meat lover's pizza.  Crust is good, not too thick or thin or doughy.

name: Dennis Dueck
text: I've seen a lot of great reviews so I decided to give them a try and I don't know if I just caught them on an off day but it was not good. The dough was spongy I'm assuming it was old, one of the pizzas I gotten I put the flavored crust but ‚Ä¶More

name: Mayra M
text: Great customer service and great pizza

name: Scott Sourile
text: Not the worst pizza. Tried them the first time, and I was not impressed. The pizza tasted overcooked. I don't know if they just aren't my cup of tea, but I don't think I'll be ordering from them again soon.

name: K
text: Used to eat here when I lived  on the east coast in the south. I was so excited when I found out we had one in EP. It didn't disappoint, it was just as delicious as I remember.

name: Katharine Long
text: 2 words. Flavored. Crust.

name: A11 rojo2
text: I love every single thing...LOVE

name: Gabriel Lopez
text: Expensive little Caesars, some what similar in taste and the the entrance has some resemblance as well. Only difference is the "flavored" crust.. Was tastey but nothing really different that you can order online from other pizza chains. Staff was friendly and prompt.

name: Jose Diaz-Couder
text: Excellent food !

name: Juan Estrada
text: Great pizza ,good value overall...

name: Moises Valadez
text: I have been buying hungry howies for quite some time by now. The other day I went ahead and got a large pepperoni pizza and a Caesar salad. The star was friendly and got me a great offer of a large pizza for $5.99 ‚Ä¶More

text: Pizza is delicious. I don't know why people say it tastes like Little Caesar's because it doesn't.

name: Ashley Wilson
text: Great customer service and Ozzie was Amazing

name: BlueMermaid67

name: Mandarina Weaver

name: Fernando Villarreal III
text: Pizzas, subs, wings and salads.  Everything is so good!!!  Customer service is second to none.  Love this place on the far East side of town.

name: Peter Donohoe
text: This place is right around the corner from our house so we go all the time. Now, I am pretty picky about my pizza. From the sauce to the crust to the amount of cheese and the even dispersment of the toppings.

name: Mari Mariee
text: Good pizza but kind of pricey for a large 1 topping almost $7. Similar to Speedys and Little Cesar's. Don't know why its more expensive.

name: Ina Zambrano
text: Fast and friendly service. Affordable prices and a variety of choices on the menu.

name: Cesar Rodriguez
text: This pizza represents what it means to be American and every single worker was more than amazing and kind. I much rather go here than church every Sunday !

name: Marylou Kennedy
text: My favorite pizza..love the buttery flavored crust..

name: Steph BDena

text: If I go to the Hungry Howie's from all the way Transmountain and Dyer you know it's good I just wish there was one in the Northeast

text: For some reason this pizza reminds me of my childhood days.  Very nostalgic flavors.

text: Really good pizza

name: Jeff Weaver

name: Daniel Vargas

name: Frank Lira
text: Great taste and very friendly staff. Would recommend to anyone!

name: Jael Barboza
text: The best place in El Paso for sure!! they've a lot of specials I received on the mail some cupons and I couldn't wait to use them I got two large pepperoni pizzas plus a 3 cheeser Bread I just paid $13. Yummm it was delicious, definetly my new place to order.  Thank you Hungry Howies!

text: The pizza is great! Our new Friday night spot for pizza and wings! You must try!

text:
Really Delicious and right in time!!
Thank you

Same taste than cheap pizzas places but little more expensive, customer service is poor but for that price I can ask for more. I have speedys pizza in front of my house so I stay with them.
Good luck.

text: I will say this is one of the best Pizza we had since coming to El Paso.. Stuffed Crust is awesome !! We will be a returning to try your specialty Pizza...

text: It was really good. Super quick delivery. I wish they had garlic parmesan wings but thats me being picky. Lol

name: Vanilla B
text: The pizza and howie bread was very mediocre. The flavored crust was flavorless and the howie bread was a blander version of any other pizza joints breadsticks. Honestly for the price you could take a couple of steps  to speedy's pizza, spend the same amount or less and get a better pizza and sides.
